items.sentence: Don\'t you think it\'s still a little too early to talk to Tom about this?
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough money to buy everything he needed.
When I was a teenager, I used to visit my grandparents about once a month.
Tom has three sons. One lives in Boston and the other two live in Chicago.
Tom is carrying an umbrella because it was raining when he left his house.
Tom is the type of person who likes to argue just for the sake of arguing.
Tom knew a man whose father was a helicopter pilot during the Vietnam War.
I did take a French class, but I still can\'t understand French very well.
I\'ve already forgotten what time you said the meeting was going to start.
I had to take a bus from Boston because all the flights had been canceled.
